summary: I OWN A 2002 FORD ESCAPE XLT THAT STALLED TODAY FOR THE FIRST TIME AT 8900 MILES.  I HAVE READ A LOT OF EMAILS ON ESCAPE-CENTRAL.COM ON THE EXACT SAME PROBLEM.  WHY ISN'T FORD AGGRESSIVELY DOING SOMETHING TO FIX IT?  I WAS TRAVELING ON A VERY BUSY STREET UNDER CONSTRUCTION WITH NO TURN OFF WHEN IT HAPPENED.  I ALMOST WAS REAR ENDED AND IT COULD HAVE BEEN A  VERY BAD ACCIDENT.   *NLM
